definitions.definition: A prisoner sentenced to life in prison.
A prisoner sentenced to transportation for life.
A person with a singular career path, especially in the military.
A species seen for the first time by a naturalist who is keeping a list of all the species they have seen.

main_definition: A prisoner sentenced to life in prison.
secondary_definitions: A prisoner sentenced to transportation for life.
A person with a singular career path, especially in the military.
A species seen for the first time by a naturalist who is keeping a list of all the species they have seen.
